item.title: Meghan Markle returns to Instagram after 5 years, posts first video - The Times of India
item.description:
Meghan Markle Returns to Instagram After 5 Years, Posts First Video

Date: October 2023 | Source: The Times

Meghan Markle has made her comeback to Instagram, posting her first video in five years. This return marks a significant moment for the Duchess of Sussex as she reconnects with her followers.

  • Meghan's first post features a video highlighting some of her recent activities.
  • The video showcases her involvement in various charitable initiatives.
  • The return is seen as a way for her to engage more with the public and share her perspective.
“Excited to share more of my journey with all of you.”

This return to social media could have implications for her public image and influence as a celebrity.

item.title: Netflix accidentally leaks ‘Squid Game 3’ premiere date - 123telugu
item.description:
Netflix Accidentally Leaks ‘Squid Game 3’ Premiere Date

Published on Jan 2, 2025 | Source: 123Telugu

The recent leak from Netflix revealed the long-awaited premiere date for ‘Squid Game 3’ as June 27, 2025, generating excitement among fans.

  • Recent season, ‘Squid Game 2’, had over 62 million views but didn't match the success of its predecessor.
  • The leaked release date came from a now-deleted YouTube video by Netflix.
  • There are no new star additions for Season 3, as Netflix dispelled rumors about Leonardo DiCaprio joining the cast.
  • Creators are under pressure to craft innovative games for the new season to recapture the series' initial excitement.
“As fans eagerly await Squid Game 3, all eyes are on how the show will evolve to reclaim its place as a cultural phenomenon.”

This leak has excited fans, but it also raises questions about the series' ability to maintain its momentum and cultural significance.

item.title: Pushpa 2 box office Day 28: Allu Arjun film welcomes 2025 in style - India Today
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Collection Day 28: Allu Arjun's Film Welcomes 2025 in Style

Published On: Jan 2, 2025

Source: India Today

Allu Arjun's Pushpa 2: The Rule welcomed 2025 in style, with a significant increase in box office collection on January 1.

  • The film earned ₹1,184 crore nett in India over 28 days.
  • On January 1, it saw a 70% increase in collection, earning ₹13.15 crore nett on that day.
  • The Hindi version generated ₹9.5 crore nett, while the Telugu version earned ₹3.15 crore nett.
  • The total earnings include ₹774.65 crore nett from the Hindi version and ₹330.53 crore from the Telugu version.
  • Pushpa 2 aims for a ₹2,000-crore gross worldwide milestone.
“Pushpa 2 is still continuing its dream run in theatres, especially in the Hindi belt.”

The film, directed by Sukumar, features Allu Arjun alongside Rashmika Mandanna and Fahadh Faasil. It has been a record-breaking success globally.

item.title: Ranbir Kapoor, Alia Bhatt, Raha Kapoor enjoy first sunset of 2025 with extended family in Thailand. See pic - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Ranbir Kapoor, Alia Bhatt, Raha Kapoor enjoy first sunset of 2025 with extended family in Thailand

Publication Date: Jan 02, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Ranbir Kapoor, Alia Bhatt, and their daughter Raha Kapoor are enjoying their New Year's celebration in Thailand with extended family. The gathering includes several notable family members, capturing memorable moments during their holiday.

  • Riddhima Kapoor shared a family portrait on Instagram, saying, “Memories made together last a lifetime.”
  • The family includes familiar faces like filmmaker Ayan Mukerji, Alia's sister Shaheen Bhatt, and mother Soni Razdan.
  • A touching video of Ranbir embracing Alia at midnight was shared by Neetu Kapoor on Instagram.
  • Ranbir and Alia will next be seen in the movie Love & War.
A touching video captured the moment Ranbir ran to embrace Alia as the clock struck midnight.

The Kapoor family's New Year celebration in Thailand highlights the joy of family gatherings and the warmth of shared experiences.

item.title: Jennifer Lopez calls Ben Affleck's ex Jennifer Garner the 'real villain' of their divorce: ‘Was played for a total fool’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Jennifer Lopez calls Ben Affleck's ex Jennifer Garner the 'real villain' of their divorce: ‘Was played for a total fool’

Date: Jan 02, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Jennifer Lopez is reportedly feeling humiliated as Ben Affleck rekindles his relationship with ex-wife Jennifer Garner during their ongoing divorce.

  • Lopez has been suspicious of Affleck and Garner's closeness, viewing it as a betrayal.
  • A source claims Lopez feels threatened by Garner and was made to feel like 'a total fool'.
  • Affleck has turned to Garner for support since their divorce filing last August.
  • Reports suggest that divorce proceedings between Lopez and Affleck have stalled due to asset division disagreements.
“J. Lo felt threatened by Jen Garner for almost all of her marriage.”

This situation illustrates the complexities of relationships and breakups when children and past marriages are involved.

item.title: Game Changer trailer runtime revealed? - 123telugu
item.description:
Game Changer trailer runtime revealed?

Published on: Jan 2, 2025 8:00 am IST

The highly anticipated political drama Game Changer is set to hit theaters in just eight days, generating excitement due to the collaboration between Ram Charan and Shankar.

  • The theatrical trailer will be released at 05:04 PM today during a special event with SS Rajamouli as chief guest.
  • The trailer has a runtime of 2 minutes and 43 seconds, featuring powerful moments and impactful dialogues.
  • Produced by Dil Raju, the film stars Kiara Advani, SJ Suryah, and others, with music by Thaman.
  • Game Changer will be released in all major Indian languages.
“Fans of Ram Charan are eagerly waiting to watch it as soon as it drops.”

The excitement surrounding the film emphasizes the strong collaboration between renowned talents in the industry.

item.title: ‘Fantastic start to 2025’: Diljit Dosanjh meets PM Modi - The Tribune India
item.description:
Diljit Dosanjh's Memorable Meeting with PM Modi Marks a Fantastic Start to 2025

Publication Date: January 2025
Source: The Tribune

Punjabi singer-actor Diljit Dosanjh met Prime Minister Narendra Modi for the first time, describing the encounter as a fantastic start to 2025.

The meeting included discussions about music and culture.

  • Diljit concluded his pan-India tour recently.
  • He shared glimpses of the meeting on social media.
  • PM Modi praised Dosanjh's multifaceted talent.
“A fantastic start to 2025. A memorable meeting with PM @narendramodi ji. We talked about a lot of things, including music of course!” - Diljit Dosanjh

This meeting has generated positive sentiments among fans and highlighted the connection between music and culture in India.

item.title: 'It Ends With Us' director Justin Baldoni files $250 MILLION lawsuit against The New York Times for libel - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Justin Baldoni Files $250 Million Lawsuit Against The New York Times Over Blake Lively Claims

Published on: New Year's Eve, Source: Times of India

The lawsuit centers around allegations of libel and false light invasion of privacy following an article that claimed false narratives about Baldoni and actress Blake Lively.

  • Justin Baldoni has filed a $250 million lawsuit against The New York Times.
  • The lawsuit is supported by co-plaintiffs including publicists and producers.
  • Baldoni accuses the Times of publishing defamatory claims based on allegations made by Lively.
  • He claims the newspaper distorted communications and relied heavily on Lively's unverified narrative.
  • In a counter-response, Blake Lively has filed a federal lawsuit against Baldoni, alleging harassment and a retaliatory scheme.
  • The romantic drama 'It Ends With Us' premiered amid ongoing tensions between Baldoni and Lively.
  • The New York Times stated they will vigorously defend against the lawsuit.
“The role of an independent news organization is to follow the facts where they lead. Our story was meticulously and responsibly reported.” - New York Times spokesperson

This legal battle highlights the increasing tensions in Hollywood and questions surrounding public narratives and reputations.

item.title: Jennifer Garner’s family 'wants' her back with ex Ben Affleck especially after… - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Jennifer Garner's Family Hopes for Reunion with Ex-Husband Ben Affleck

Published on: Jan 02, 2025 06:57 AM IST

Jennifer Garner's family is rooting for a reunion between the actress and her ex-husband Ben Affleck, as the former couple has been spending quality time together with their children, including during holidays. While Garner maintains a relationship with her current beau, John Miller, her family believes there's still chemistry between her and Affleck.

Garner and Affleck, who share three children, have been spotted together recently, fueling speculation about a possible reconciliation. The 'Gone Girl' star is currently going through a high-profile divorce from Jennifer Lopez.

  1. Garner's family is hoping for a reunion.The former couple has been spending more time together.Affleck's friends and family are supportive of a reunion.Garner's current partner, John Miller, may feel like a 'third wheel.'
"Ben is laying it on thick, he’s giving Jen so much of himself and his attention and being so charming," a source told In Touch. "It’s very hard not to love him when he’s acting this way, and a lot of people are predicting that they could end up back together."

While there's no confirmation of a reunion, Garner's family and friends are optimistic about the possibility of the former couple getting back together.

item.title: Pushpa 2 India Box Office Day 28 (Early Trends): Almost 70% Jump & 1208 Crore – Allu Arjun Is Still Screaming Jhukega Nahi Saala! - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2: Box Office Day 28 - Early Trends Show Almost 70% Jump, Estimated Earnings at 1208 Crore

Date & Source: January 1, 2024, Koimoi

It has been 28 days, and Pushpa 2 is still performing exceptionally well at the box office, with estimated earnings of 1208 - 1209 crore! Mounted on a budget of 500 crore, the film has registered a profit of 141.6% at the box office in India.

Pushpa 2 India Box Office Day 28 Estimates

On the 28th day, January 1, the fourth Wednesday, Pushpa 2 roared yet again on the New Year holiday with almost a 70% jump from the previous day and brought almost 13 - 13.5 crore collection at the box office, taking the total earnings to more than 1208 crore!

Will Pushpa 3 See The Light Of The Day?

Earlier this year, at the Berlin Film Festival, Allu Arjun has already discussed the idea of Pushpa 3 and turning the film into a franchise. It would be interesting to see if the idea sees the light of the day sooner than planned owing to the magnanimous box office collection delivered by the sequel.

item.title: Pushpa 2 box office collection Day 28: Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna starrer shatters records; earns o - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Pushpa 2 box office collection Day 28: Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna starrer shatters records; earns over Rs 10 crore on New Year's day

Publication Date: January 1, 2024

Source: Times of India

The unstoppable 'Pushpa 2: The Rule', starring Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna, continues to break records at the box office, achieving remarkable earnings even in its fourth week.

  • On Day 28, the film earned an estimated Rs 13.15 crore across all languages.
  • The Hindi version contributed approximately Rs 9.5 crore, a rare figure for a film this late in its theatrical run.
  • The Telugu version added Rs 3.15 crore to the day's total.
  • Dubbing versions in Tamil, Kannada, and Malayalam accounted for about Rs 1 crore.
  • The cumulative earnings of Pushpa 2 now stand at approximately Rs 1184.65 crore, cementing its status among the highest-grossing Indian films of all time.
The film's strong New Year’s Day performance saw a staggering 70.78% boost in overall collections.

As Pushpa 2 shows no signs of slowing down, it is anticipated to climb further in box office rankings, astonishing fans and the industry alike.

item.title: Love and Relationship Horoscope for January 2, 2025 - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Love and Relationship Horoscope for January 2, 2025

Publication Date: January 2, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

This horoscope provides insights into the love and relationships for each zodiac sign for January 2, 2025, highlighting the emotional landscapes and social dynamics at play.

  • Aries: A day to reflect on connection and self needs amidst feelings of loneliness.
  • Taurus: Navigating changes in friendships, allowing relationships to evolve.
  • Gemini: A strong desire for social interaction and connection; small gestures matter.
  • Cancer: A day filled with nostalgia and opportunities to deepen ties with loved ones.
  • Leo: Focus on goals despite distractions; love will come when prioritized.
  • Virgo: Productivity leads to quality time with loved ones; balance is key.
  • Libra: Need for authenticity in relationships; avoid misunderstandings.
  • Scorpio: Ignoring gossip and focusing on genuine relationships is essential.
  • Sagittarius: Embrace vulnerability for deeper connections with partners.
  • Capricorn: Striving for balance between joy and responsibilities in communication.
  • Aquarius: Enjoy leisure time by prioritizing what matters most in your life.
  • Pisces: Let go of guilt and enjoy social interactions with confidence.
"Love is most likely to blossom where you are relaxed and free." - Neeraj Dhankher

Overall, January 2 invites individuals to navigate their emotional needs while fostering connections with their loved ones.

item.title: Katrina Kaif Is All Smiles As She Wishes Happy New Year To Fans, Shares Photos From Her Celebration - News18
item.description:
Katrina Kaif Is All Smiles As She Wishes Happy New Year To Fans, Shares Photos From Her Celebration

Date: January 01, 2025
Source: News18

Katrina Kaif and Vicky Kaushal celebrated the New Year at an undisclosed location. Katrina shared joyous photos with her fans.

  • Katrina shared pictures in a cute polka dress, captioned "2024 2025, Happy New Year !!!".
  • The couple enjoyed peaceful moments together by the ocean, embracing the tranquility.
  • Fans expressed their happiness and well-wishes in response to Katrina's posts.
  • The couple had a heartwarming Christmas celebration shared on social media.
“2024 2025, Happy New Year !!!” – Katrina Kaif

This cheerful celebration highlights the couple’s warm relationship and their connection with fans.

item.title: PM Modi meets Diljit Dosanjh; calls singer 'multifaceted, blend of talent and tradition' - TOI Etimes
item.description:
PM Modi Meets Diljit Dosanjh

Date: January 2, 2025, Source: Times of India

Prime Minister Narendra Modi met singer-actor Diljit Dosanjh and praised him as 'a combination of talent and tradition'. The two discussed music, culture, and India's vibrancy, including yoga, during their 'memorable' meeting.

  1. Modi lauded Dosanjh's achievements and praised his global success.
  2. Dosanjh admired PM Modi's personal journey and his connection with India.
  3. The meeting concluded with both parties expressing gratitude.
"A fantastic start to 2025. A very memorable meeting with PM @narendramodi Ji." - Diljit Dosanjh

Earlier, Diljit's concert in Ludhiana faced controversy due to songs promoting alcohol, despite previous warnings.

item.title: Angelina Jolie's kids wanted her to defend herself in 8-year divorce battle; Brad Pitt source counters with winery sale - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Brad Pitt, Angelina Jolie's Kids and the Ongoing Divorce Saga

Date & Source: January 1, 2025, Hindustan Times

Introduction: Despite finalizing their divorce, Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt's legal battle continues, with their kids taking sides and a contentious winery sale at the center of their dispute.

  1. Jolie and Pitt's kids have publicly supported their mother during the divorce process.
  2. Three of their six children have dropped 'Pitt' from their names.
  3. Jolie's sons Maddox and Pax worked with her on a movie set, showing their support.
  4. Pitt and Jolie's divorce settlement was finalized on December 30, 2024.
  5. Their fight over the French winery, Chateau Miraval, continues.

A source close to Jolie told PEOPLE that her kids 'wanted her to speak up for herself, to defend herself over these years but she reminds them to focus on changing laws over telling public stories.'

A Brad Pitt source accused Jolie of deliberately disregarding their agreement regarding the winery, stating that she sold her share to 'punish' Pitt.

Conclusion: Despite the finalization of their divorce, Pitt and Jolie's legal battle continues, with their kids taking sides and the future of their co-owned winery at stake.

item.title: Sajid Khan recalls tough time after MeToo allegations despite clean chit: 'I have thought of ending my li - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Title: Sajid Khan Recalls Tough Time After MeToo Allegations Despite Clean Chit: 'I Have Thought of Ending My Life Many Times in the Last Six Years'

Date: 2023-03-08, Source: Times of India

In 2018, during the #MeToo movement, Sajid Khan faced multiple sexual harassment allegations, which severely impacted his career. After six years of silence, the 54-year-old filmmaker opens up about the mental and physical toll this period has inflicted on him.

  1. Allegations led to a career collapse overnight.
  2. Sajid faced financial hardships, including selling his house.
  3. He contemplated ending his life multiple times.
  4. Despite clearance from the Indian Film and Television Directors Association (IFTDA), he struggled to find work.
  5. Sajid acknowledged his blunt personality and past offensive humor, expressing regret and a change in his communication style.
  6. He has a film starting mid-year but acknowledges the challenges in the industry.

"I have thought of ending my life many times in the last six years." - Sajid Khan

Sajid emphasizes his desire to entertain and move forward, despite the hardships he has faced.

item.title: 38-Year-Old Man Warns Of World War III In 2025, Past Predictions Proven True - News18
item.description:
38-Year-Old Man Warns Of World War III In 2025, Past Predictions Proven True

Date: January 01, 2025 Source: News18

As the world welcomes a new year, many wonder what the future holds. Nicholas Aujula, a 38-year-old hypnotherapist who predicted the COVID-19 pandemic, forecasts significant global events for 2025.

  • Aujula predicts a Third World War will occur in 2025, characterized by violence and political murders.
  • He foresees excessive rainfall leading to devastating floods, displacing millions.
  • The predictions include rising sea levels that may submerge cities.
  • Aujula indicates a political downfall for British PM Keir Starmer and soaring global inflation.
  • On a personal level, he predicts reconciliation between Prince William and Harry.
“The Third World War is certain to happen in 2025. This will be a year where there will be no compassion.” - Nicholas Aujula

While Aujula's past predictions have proven true, the world waits to see if his latest forecasts will manifest.

item.title: Siddharth corrects Boney Kapoor as he calls Jr NTR a 'new face': 'You are talking about one of the bigges - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Siddharth Corrects Boney Kapoor on Jr NTR's Star Status

Publication Date: Available upon access

Source: Available upon access

In a recent exchange, actor Siddharth responded to Boney Kapoor, who referred to Jr NTR as a 'new face' in the industry, emphasizing Jr NTR's stature as one of the biggest superstars in cinema.

  • Siddharth pointed out the established status of Jr NTR in the film industry.
  • Boney Kapoor's comments seem to downplay Jr NTR's long-standing career.
  • The discussion highlights the recognition and respect given to established actors in the industry.
“You are talking about one of the biggest superstars in the industry,” Siddharth emphasized.

This exchange sheds light on the understanding and acknowledgment of veteran actors in the film sector, showcasing the importance of recognizing their contributions.
